Anyone finding this interesting should look up "Plastic Sulfur"  It is formed by rapidly cooling molten sulfur. It is  a pliable, plastic material that with age turns back to amorphous or hard sulfur. Further information may be found by looking up "allotrope's of sulfur"  It is an unusual quality.
